<About me>

Based in Marin County California, I'm a self-taught, aspiring JavaScript / CoffeeScript programmer who has a passion for web development and problem solving.

When I’m not out on the trails of Marin experiencing all that nature has to offer or kicking butt at Battlefield on the PC, I'm learning things like jQuery's Ajax and Cross-origin resource sharing or MongoDB’s Aggregation operations, just to name a few.

These are some of the technologies that I have experience with:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • CoffeeScript
  • jQuery
  • Backbone.JS
  • Node.JS
  • MongoDB
  • Gulp.JS
  • NPM
  • Git
  • Linux

</About me>

Projects

Bathroom Chore Calendar


This is a small, original app that demonstrates simple io functionality.

It was built using Fullcalendar for the calendar parts, CoffeeScript for the logic, jQueryUI for the drag and drop function and HTML5 local storage for saving the application state.

Run the DEMO

See it on GitHub

This Website


This website was built using fullpage.js for the overall feel of the navigation. For styling I used Sass and Bootstrap as well as the Sass Mixin called sass-mq for some of the responsivness.

To contact me through the website, I've set up an Express.js server running emailjs. This, along with some Gmail credentials does the job of sending email messages using the form on the contact page.

Run the DEMO

See it on GitHub
